string.text: Adds 40% physical resistance against ranged damage for 15 seconds to the caster.
Heals the caster for 3 health every second for 7 seconds.
A sickly short ranged poisonous gas cloud.
Buff a target ally's weapon to do additional magic damage.
Allies in a 3 meter radius gain 20% physical resistance for 15 seconds.
Adds 20% physical damage bonus for 15 seconds to the caster.
Dry winds from the desert knock down victims and apply minor damage.
There is nothing quite as welcoming as a fireball to the face. Deals 70 damage in a 6 meter radius and burns the foes for 5 seconds.
Hurl fragments of solidified lava at the enemy dealing medium damage on contact.
A fast moving flaming bolt that does medium damage on impact.
Blast the enemy with a short ranged searing flame attack that does medium damage.
The caster wraps himself in a cloak of magical flame that shields him from physical (20%) and fire (70%) damage for 30 seconds. The cloak also reflects a portion of damage taken in melee.
Buff the weapons of allies in a 15 meter radius with the Flaming trait for 45 seconds. The weapons burst into fire and burn every enemy they strike.
Conjure a large burning skull that moves forward burning everything in its path.
A randomly moving pillar of searing flame is summoned on the battlefield. Flesh and skin melt, while bones turn to ash.
Hurl an electric bolt at the enemy that does medium damage on impact.
A gust of wind knocks down victims and applies minor damage.
A ball of lightning that zaps enemies in its area for medium damage.
Divining favorable signs, the caster guides the minds of his fellow warriors. Allies in a 10 meter radius gain 50% physical resistance for 50 seconds.
Stormy clouds loom over the area showering those below with sharp shards of ice.
A large meteor strikes the area killing all below in a giant shockwave.
A single large bolt of lightning crashes down from the skies with a sizeable electric charge.
The wizard speaks an ancient three-word hex, cursing the enemies and iposing a 40% penalty to movement and attack speed, as well as damage dealt.
A bolt of cleansing energy fly from the caster's hands, searing evil wherever it strikes.
Allies in the area of effect regenerate health over time.
The wizard calls upon the beneficent Guardian of Light to protect his allies from harm. Grants 50% physical resistance for a duration 50 seconds.
Sharp shards of light fly towards the target piercing through the toughest armor.
A large pillar of light applies high damage to those caught in the beam.
Columns of light rise from the ground in a path.
The wizard conjures an arcane net in the selected area. Any foe caught in the spell is halted for 25 seconds.
Slows down time, while units around you move unhindered.
A bolt of Dhar flies from the caster's eyes, and what flesh it touches blackens and withers, peeling away completely to reveal bleached white bone beneath.
Raises old bones from the ground for the Necromancer to command. Summon 25 Skeleton Warriors.
Shadowy orbs of blood follow the target staining the ground beneath every step of the way. Deals damage in a medium area.
The wizard draws tendrils of the Wind of Death to restore his minions and fill them with unholy vigour. Heals allies over time in a radius.
The animated dead are normally ungainly and cumbersome; this spell, however, gives them grace and speed - and makes them all the more deadly as a result.
Invoke the spirits of the dead to consume the souls of the living. Applies medium damage while moving along its path.
Drawing forth the dark energy coursing through the land, the necromancer searches long dead bodies to answer his summons. Raise 25 Grave Guard.
The necromancer utters an ancient curse, which causes the foe to age at a horrific rate. Reduces enemy attack and movement speed by 50% for a duration of 30 seconds.
The caster assails the enemy with a freezing gale.
The wizard rips open the sky and calls down a bolt burning with dark flames on the foe.
A crackling black bolt of energy that explodes in a fireball and sets victims on fire.
A black cloud looms over the targeted area striking those below with arcane lightning bolts.
The caster draws unstable power from the Realm of Chaos to empower his allies. Grants 20% physical bonus damage for a duration of 35 seconds.
Conjures a screaming skull dripping with acid that moves forward damaging everything in its path.

The caster tears down the walls between realities, and a black cloud of roiling energy sweeps across the battlefield. As the darkness travels, slimy tentacles lash out from its depths, draggin unfortunate victims screaming to an unknown fate.
Enemies affected experience a soul draining damage over time effect, causing them to take 12 damage every second for a duration of 12 seconds.
The wizard infuses and invigorates his allies with pure magical energies.
Utter one secret word, and your foes shall burst with fire and flame. Deals large damage as well as damage over time in the area.
A brilliant sphere of light emerges from the wizard's fingertips. Enemies affected suffer medium damage.
The Elf mage channels all eight Winds of Magic and invokes the name of Aenarion, the first of Phoenix Kings. Allies around the wizard strike with greater frequency.
The Mage places a curse in the area - the air around enemies distorts and guides allied projectiles with astounding accuracy.
Conjures a brilliant vortex of shimmering light containing all eight colors of Winds of Magic.
The caster summons an ethereal dome to protect his allies from ranged fire.
Tendrils emerge from the ground reaching out and attacking enemies in the area. Knocks down, dismounts and slows (80%) enemies, while dealing 10 damage per second for 15 seconds.
Caster merges their eyes, firing a single fast, penetrating projectile in the aimed direction.
Hardens the skin of targets, making them tougher, providing 50% physical resistance for 80 secouds
A small area radiates unbearable heat, causing fatigue, impairing movement speed by 50%, and making the enemies slightly vulnerable to fire damage for 15 seconds.
Invoking the name of Duthandor, lord of the ancient wildshrines, the wizard mends wounds and broken bones of his comrades. Allies in a 3 meter radius gain 5 HP per second for 12 seconds.
Sucks the moisture and fluids from the foe, dealing 5 damage per second for total duration of 10 seconds.
Raw energy flows across the battlefield, renewing lost vigour and mending wounds. Heals 30 hitpoints flat, and 10 hitpoints of all friendly targets inside the area for 12 seconds.
Prickly gorse protects allies in the radius. Reflects 25% of incoming melee damage.
The caster throws a javelin like amber spear in the targeted direction that penetrates multiple targets.
Roots erupt from the ground preventing all enemies from moving for a duration of 10 seconds.
A magical skin surrounds the wizard, protecting him from physical damage (40%) for a duration of 40 seconds.
A storm of stones falls down on the foe, dealing physical damage in a radius.
Summons a nightmare of crows in the targeted area. Affected enemies suffer light damage over time and their physical resistance is reduced by 20% for 10 seconds.
Unleashes the primal savagery of the caster's allies, driving them into a frenzy. Grants a 25% physical damage and attack speed bonus for a duration of 60 seconds.
Woodland sprites hinder all enemies caught in the area for 15 seconds, reducing movement (35%) and attack speed (50%) as well as causing 3 damage per second.
Infuses weapons of allies with gleaming energies - Even a rusty sword turns deadly with the help of a Metal Wizard. Friendly units deal 20% magic and fire damage for a duration of 60 seconds.
The Gold Wizard fires a projectile of golden energy out of his forehead. The missile homes in on the target and deals 100 physical damage.
Allies are protected by an enchantment of iron and silver. Provides 60% physical resistance for a duration of 45 seconds.
At a flick of the caster's wrist, the armor of foes is consumed by rust. Imposes a 70% physical resistance penalty for a duration of 120 seconds.
A glittering globe of energy engulfs and burns foes alive. Those unfortunate enough to survive are also slowed down for a short duration.
By weaving the brilliant Wind of Chamon, the wizard attempts to transmute his foes into statues of pure gold. Deals continuous damage and greatly slows down enemies.
The wizard calls forth a pair of massive golden hounds that travel in a circular motion.
Shadowy orbs of blood fly towards the target staining the ground beneath every step of the way.
Launch a devastating blast of agony.
Invoking the name of Duthandor, lord of the ancient wildshrines, the wizard mends wounds and broken bones of his comrades. Allies in a 3 meter radius gain 5 HP per second for 12 seconds.

You throw a fiery missile that takes the form of Sigmar’s famed twin-tailed comet. A comet of Sigmar is a holy missile dealing 30 damage. It can knock units down, or throw them off horse. Only affects enemies
Allies in a 5 meter radius gain 5 Healthpoints every 2 seconds for 9 seconds.
Allies in a 3 meter radius gain 35% physical resistance for 8 seconds.
Buff the weapons of allies in a 5 meter radius with the Flaming trait for 20 seconds. The weapons burst into fire and burn every enemy they strike.
The wolf-priest lets out a mighty howl and dedicates the kill to Ulric. Gain +30% movement and attack speed for 25 seconds.
The priest's allies are driven into a zealous frenzy. Friendly troops in a 10 meter radius gain +35% physical damage as well as Unbreakable and Unstoppable for 20 seconds.
The wolf-priest summons an icy hailstorm within an area. Enemies suffer a -50% movement and attack speed penalty as well as damage over time.

The priest roars with a grand prayer and calls freezing blast of blue flames to cleanse a targeted area of cowards and weaklings. Affected enemies take damage, suffer a -50% movement and attack speed penalty as well as damage over time.
Power of the Lady causes enemy missiles to vanish mid-air. Grants 90% ranged physical resistance in a radius.
The Lady protects Damsels and their followers from harm. Grants 80% magic, lightning and fire resistance in a radius.
The Lady's divine power causes allies' armor to deflect enemy blows. Grants 50% physical resistance in a radius.
The Damsel conjures a vision of the Lady of the Lake to guide Bretonnians into the frey. Grants 25% attack speed bonus in a radius.
